ygData.subject: Re: Skill Level Formulas **Spoiler**
ygData.msgSnippet: Fishing does not have cap ... From: Michael C. Haferkamp  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com  Date: Monday, May 03, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
Fishing does not have cap
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael C. Haferkamp <haferkam@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 03, 1999 11:48 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Skill Level Formulas **Spoiler**


>From: "Michael C. Haferkamp" <haferkam@...>
>
>I am a Starfall, a 4th lvl WIZ on the Rallos Zek server. I spent the time
>to MAX ALL of my non-trade skills at every level. The proper formulas are
>listed below.
>
> Combat Skills ( MAX= ((lvl+1)*5) )
> (Hand-to-Hand,Piercing, Throwing, 1-H Blunt, 2-H Blunt)
> Defense ( MAX= (lvl*5) )
> Offence ( MAX= (lvl*4) )
> All Other Non-Trade Skills ( MAX= ((lvl+1)*5) )
> Bind Wound, Beg, Alcohol Tolerance, Sense Heading, Swimming, etc...
>
> I have not had the money to work on any trade skills other than Fishing
>or the occasional Baking and Tailoring. The Fishing skill seems to Max at
>((lvl+1)*5).
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist: the best source for group communications.
>http://www.onelist.com
>Join today!
>
